reviews.review: el juego es muy bueno pero te mete un vicio mas duro que las drogas

As someone who have played this game for longer than anyone should , only to get a new prestige system and being made to redo  everything i've reached so far, i 'm really thinking about  deleting the game. So if you are a new player go ahead it's a good game at it's gener. But always be prepaired for a new 'update' that can mess up the whole game ,with weird balance changes which create more problems than which they solve . Thanks for the experience developers! It was nice till it lasted.
great i really liked the part where i played it so long that i no longer felt my soul

it has a lot of replayability and is fun with friends, but also SOMETIMES fun with randoms if they aren't -10 IQ.

Some killers are really stupid like The Plague, Legion, Nemesis, The Spirit, etc. 
I can genuinely go on and on about more really annoying killers but at least most of them have counters to them; you just really have to be skilled or have good teammates.
just started playing really fun and addicting
this game is really good its one of my fav but its not for kids theres a lot of blood and gore but other that that its awsome
Aunque aún intentan balancear de mejor manera el juego, es uno muy entretenido y que no hay pierde para darle una oportunidad y probarlo.
Jogo extremamento divertido. Legal pra jogar com amigos ou sozinho. A curva de aprendizado é mediana.

As a newbie player I can't reccomend this game at all.
I played as a Killer and you get thrown into matches with a whole bunch of very experienced players.
Survivors game entirely consists of trolling killers all way long. 
As a newbie you have no chance to get to enjoy and love this game.

Instead of a gameplay where survivors try to avoid the killer and run for their live you get the feeling that a killer is like a clown that premade groups can troll as they want to completly twist the meaning of the gameplay.

Don't buy this game if you:
1) don't have a premade group to learn this game
2) don't want to spent a whole bunch of time into frustrating gameplay until you may reach a point where you can maybe handle trolling and toxic survivor groups

Yes BUT, if you're running into a killer that's tunneling, camping, face camping etc. it's no fun. especially if you're playing with some shit ass immersed survivors, then it's one hell of a mess. This game is one of my favorite, if only i play with some, who got just a little gameknowledge. And to be fair, this game only becomes fun when you just know a little of what you're doing.
jogo é baum fml pode confiar :)

I haven't left my house in 3 months, please send help. This game makes me want to off myself, but I know that if I do that, I'll never be able to play this game again, for I shall be dead, and I've got a hungering addiction that is killing me from the inside. My life is now meaningless, thus making me more depressed.

Please, if you do not want to end up like me, do not purchase this game.

One of the greatest games of all time. Can be a pain in the butt to play sometimes and can leave you feeling like crap. HOWEVER, no matter how much I try, I cannot put this game down. It is highly addictive and leaves me wanting to play more. To collect every character, perk, outfit and achievements, trying hundreds of perk combos and figuring out what works and what does not. Sure there are a few things about this game that can be a bit sucky at times, certain mechanics are less than desirable, HOWEVER, the team at behavior strive to adapt and better this game to suit the needs and wants of the community, while still staying true to the core purpose of the game.

Es ist KEIN Matchmaking vorhanden es Spielen Leute mit 20h gegen welche mit 5000h. Die einzigen die damit Spaß haben sind die Tryharder, welche dann ab und zu mal gegen ein paar leichte Gegner spielen können. Das Game wird sterben wen es so weiter geht.

They need to make more effort in making this a better experience for new players. Haven't had a worse new player experience for any other game. I'd rather wait 5 minutes for a match then constantly get paired up with killers that are obviously more experienced. Out of the last 50 matches I've maybe survived twice. I know you can't survive every game but most times I don't even get a single generator. It's so annoying to constantly get next to no blood points every single game.
